about_the_game:
Step into the shadows of an abandoned mansion in Duchess Curse, a chilling horror adventure that blurs the lines between reality and the supernatural. You play as a dedicated security guard, tasked with a simple routine: turning off the lights in an old, mysterious estate. However, as darkness envelops the mansion, you quickly realize that this is no ordinary night on the job.

Trapped in the Past
As the last flicker of light fades, the doors lock behind you, sealing you inside a labyrinth of secrets and whispers. Strange occurrences unravel the fabric of your reality, leading you deeper into the mansion's dark history. Each corner holds clues to the tragic tale of the Duchess, who, in her desperate attempt to communicate with her deceased daughter, inadvertently summoned the spirit of a malevolent witch.

Unearth the Truth
Explore the mansion’s hauntingly beautiful yet unsettling environments, from opulent ballrooms to shadowy rooms. Solve intricate puzzles, piece together cryptic messages, and confront your fears as you navigate the sinister legacy of the Duchess. With each step, you’ll uncover the chilling truth of what transpired in these walls and the dark force that now haunts you.

Face the Unknown
As you delve deeper, prepare to encounter the terrifying spirit that now roams the mansion. Will you find a way to escape its grasp, or will you become yet another lost soul in its dark history?

Features:

  • Immersive Storytelling: Experience a gripping narrative filled with suspense, mystery, and supernatural elements.

  • Atmospheric Environments: Explore beautifully crafted, eerie locations that draw you into the world of the mansion.

  • Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles that reveal the mansion's dark secrets and the tragic fate of its former inhabitants.

  • Dynamic Encounters: Face unexpected challenges and horrifying spirits that will test your resolve and bravery.

Will you survive the night, or will you succumb to the darkness ...

name: The Duchess Curse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 480 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400 or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or AMD RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: As a security guard tasked with a simple job in a long-abandoned mansion, you quickly find yourself trapped within its haunted walls. Dark secrets unravel as you uncover the tragic tale of the Duchess, who, in a desperate attempt to resurrect her daughter, summoned something far more sinister.
